page.title: 01Newport Pembs.,Dyfed,W.Wales
page.content: The area under study forms the heart of the northern section of the{ {PEMBROKESHIRE NATIONAL PARK,the {NEWPORT COMMUNITY}and its immediate surrounds,nestling below the westerly extremity of the{Preseli Mountains}and overlooking{Newport Bay}and the Irish Sea. {Carningli}mountain,across to {Carn {Ffoi}forms a southerly horizon unchanged in Ages.From these vantage points we can look down on a settlement little changed in recent centuries,the town itself skirting the {castle},the ancient{harbour}on the{ {Nevern}estuary and across to the expanse of{Newport Sands}. The resident population of some 1200 people might treble with the influx of summer visitors.
